Translations.Text: Li dir My Lord cool my temper
far this materi facil me
Kaj untie nod my lang
Tial ili kompren my speech
Kaj appoint assistant por me my famili
My frat Aaron
Strengthen me him
Let him est my partner en this materi
Ke ni glor Vi frequently
Kaj commemorate Vi frequently
Vi est Seer de us
Li dir Your request granted O Moses
Ni ben vi re
When ni revealed your mother ki ni revealed
Dir ‘Jxet him boks tiam jxet him into river! River jxet him bord pik enemy de Min enemy his. ' mi dusx vi kun am Me mi hav vi far My watchful okul

Your sister marsx them dir ‘mi tell vi nursing mother pren bon zorg de him. ' Ni tiel returned vi your mother ke sxi est felicx stop worrying Kaj when vi killed ul ni sav vi grievous consequences; ja ni tested vi thoroughly. Vi rest jar popol Midyan tuj vi ven en accordance kun preciz plan
Mi far vi just Me
Ir your frat supported per My sign ne waver en memor Me
Ir Pharaoh li transgressed
Parol al him nicely; li pren heed igx reverent
Ili dir Our Lord ni tim lest li atak us transgress
Li dir est afraid mi est vi auxskult watching
Ir him dir ‘Ni est 2 messengers el your Lord Let Infan Israel ir! Vi refrain el persekut them! Ni bring sign your Lord pac est lot de those heed guidance
‘Ni inspir retribution inevitably aflikt those disbelieve turn
Li dir Who est your Lord O Moses
Li dir Our Lord est 1 who granted cxio its existence its guidance
Li dir Ki pri preter generaci
Li dir knowledge thereof est my Lord record My Lord neniam erar nor does Li forges
Li est Unu far ter habitable vi paved en gxi roads vi. Li send down cxiel akv which ni produkt many different kinds plant
Mangx raise your livestock! These est sufficient proofs those posed intelligence
